result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marquise Devone Turnbull

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Marquise Devone Turnbull not in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court for Marquise Devone Turnbull.  Prosecuting attorney Julie D Knyszek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Matter scheduled for Jury Trial.  For reasons stated on the record, state requests adjournment of jury trial; defense does not object.  Court will grants request and reschedule jury trial date.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Jury trial scheduled for December 7, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Marquise Devone Turnbull not in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes appeared by video for Marquise Devone Turnbull.  Prosecuting attorney Julie D Knyszek appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Final Pretrial held.  Parties advise Court that they remain in trial posture and have no further pretrial motions.  Case remains calendared for Jury Trial on 9/28/2022 at 9:00 am, Courthouse Room 501.
Received and Filed. State's Motion in Limine
Received and Filed. State's Witness List

Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court, defendant Marquise Devone Turnbull not in court, in custody.  Joshua Milder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held via Zoom. Defense requests a final pretrial and jury trial date. All final pretrial documents and any motions to be filed within 7 days of final pretrial. Case adjourned.  Parties are advised that effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Audrey Skwierawski, Branch 41 in Room 501 of the Courthouse.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court, defendant Marquise Devone Turnbull not in court, in custody.  Elaine B. Fehrs appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for pretrial conference. Defense is requesting adjourned status date to determine case posture. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Status conference scheduled for July 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with AMN
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Marquise Devone Turnbull in court with attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg.  Defendant Marquise Devone Turnbull in custody.  Mallory R Davis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Marquise Devone Turnbull appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Rosa, Branch 35.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d9e3cc7f-7791-ec2d-80d3-5bfcdc106eb3  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.
